scripts.redirect: set -o pipefail; (npm run simple-writer) 2>&1 | (nf run node log-forwarder.js)
scripts.redirectrx: set -o pipefail; (npm run simple-writer) 2>&1 | (nf run node log-forwarder-rx.js)
scripts.redirect2: set -o pipefail; (npm run simple-writer) 2>&1 | (nf run node node_modules/aws-cloudwatch-forwarder/main.js)
scripts.debugredirect2: set -o pipefail; (npm run simple-writer) 2>&1 | (nf run node-debug node_modules/aws-cloudwatch-forwarder/main.js)
